text: Every Damn Time is the first studio album by the Nashville, TN rock band, Black Diamond Heavies.last.fm | Black Diamond HeaviesAll Music | Black Diamond Heavies | Every Damn Time It was released in 2007 under the Alive Records Label. This is Black Diamond Heavies first album as a two-man band after Mark "Porkchop" Holder left the group in 2006, after their self-released 2004 EP You Damn Right. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:Black Diamond Heavies albums Category:Alive Naturalsound Records albums
title: Every Damn Time
